title: AI Control Panel
removedScopesHint: The following features have been converted from AI/LLM to fixed-rule algorithms and no longer consume tokens:
classSummaryHint: Generated independently for each class, sharing this config
noScopeData: No data for this scope today
systemPromptPlaceholder: Leave empty to use the built-in default prompt
systemPromptDescription: Customize the system prompt for this module to control AI's role and output style
temperatureHint: Lower values are more stable, higher values are more creative
promptDescDuty:
Input: Today's planned check items, recent high-failure items, this week's pass rate

Output JSON:
{
  "focusPoints": [{ "title": "...", "reason": "..." }],
  "tips": ["Check tip..."],
  "recentIssues": ["Recent frequent issue..."]
}
promptDescClassSummary:
Input: Class name, pass rate, recent grade, non-compliant item details
(Each class has an independent scope: class-summary-{className})

Output JSON:
{
  "classSummary": "Class weekly performance summary",
  "classAdvice": ["Improvement suggestion 1", "Improvement suggestion 2"],
  "weakAreas": [{ "title": "...", "failRate": 25 }]
}
gradeReportHint: Auto-generated when all classes complete inspection, once per grade per day
promptDescGradeReport:
Trigger: All classes in the grade complete inspection for the day
(Auto-generated, scope: grade-report-{grade})

Input: Completion status, pass rate, class ranking, weak items

Output JSON:
{
  "report": "~100-word grade daily inspection report"
}

Default Temperature: 0.1 (highly stable output)
